responses: Hello! 👋 How can I help you today?
Hi there! 👋 How can I assist you?
The tuition fee is ₹50,000 per semester.
Other fees include library fee ₹2,000, lab fee ₹3,000, and sports fee ₹1,000.
Total fee per semester is approximately ₹56,000.
Admissions are open! 📊 You can fill the form online or visit the admissions office.
Visit the college website for application forms and important dates.
The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in Engineering, Computer Science, Management, and Science streams.
We offer various UG and PG courses including Computer Science, Mechanical, Civil, Electronics, and Management programs.
Our college provides multiple courses designed to meet academic and industry requirements.
The college is open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Classes run from 9:00 AM to 4:00 PM, Monday to Friday.
You can contact the college at college@email.com or call +91-1234567890.
The library is open from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM on weekdays and 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM on Saturdays.
The cafeteria is open from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM and serves breakfast, lunch, and snacks.
The hostel fee is ₹20,000 per semester. Check-in at 7:00 AM and check-out by 10:00 PM.
